plot: When a Filipina caretaker innocently tries to distract an aging Greek Cypriot from his daily fixation with a soap star, she uncovers the disheartening truth behind his infatuation.
title: Anna
plot_es: When a Filipina caretaker innocently tries to distract an aging Greek Cypriot from his daily fixation with a soap star, she uncovers the disheartening truth behind his infatuation.
plot_en: When a Filipina caretaker innocently tries to distract an aging Greek Cypriot from his daily fixation with a soap star, she uncovers the disheartening truth behind his infatuation.
